name: The Tale of Maybe?, the Cat
name_original: The Tale of Maybe?, the Cat
description:
Once Upon a Time, there was a Cat named Maybe?.
Maybe? Was a very good cat. She was such a good kitty that her owner even let her help out with his science experiment. Because, you see, Maybe?’s owner was a scientist by the name of Erwin Schrödinger. This is her story. 

Forget everything you’ve ever learned about the Cat in Schrödinger’s famous thought experiment. This interactive experience will bring you into the real story of Maybe?, the cat known worldwide and throughout history as Schrödinger’s Cat. 

This project was made during the Epic Game Jam 2022, Schrödinger’s Edition,
a 43-hour Jam in Neuchâtel, Switzerland. 

Credits: 

Qui Cung: Game Design, Programming
Julie Baechtold: Game Art, Animation, Sound Design
Swan Keller: Game Art, Animation
Lucien Roussy: Game Art, Animation (Maybe)
Gwenäelle Barillon: Storytelling, UI, Game Art, Animation
Salhigan: Music (Tracks Used: Blountty, Facettes, Electro Night, Turn Around)
